text:
I'd like this too. The last information I saw on why they don't allow this is from a community post in 2022: "there isn't currently an option to hide subscription types from the user. This is a transparency thing, if they're signed up for a subscription type and they manage their preferences, they have to be given the option to opt-out of any subscriptions."

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Email-Marketing-Tool/Hide-email-subscriptions-from-preferences-page/m-p/724022>
